thread.title: Ant Financial to Invest $200 Million in South Korea’s Kakao Pay - WSJ
thread.title_full: Ant Financial to Invest $200 Million in South Korea’s Kakao Pay - WSJ

author: Liza Lin
title: Ant Financial to Invest $200 Million in South Korea’s Kakao Pay - WSJ
text:
Ant Financial to Invest $200 Million in South Korea’s Kakao Pay Alibaba’s financial arm is expanding overseas as competition heats up in China By @liz_in_shanghai Feb. 20, 2017 9:35 p.m. ET 
SHANGHAI—The financial arm of Chinese internet giant Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., will invest $200 million in the payments unit of South Korean messaging company Kakao Corp. to grow its global payments network. 
Ant Financial Services Group said in a statement Chinese users of its Alipay digital payments service will be able to use the platform in South Korea through Kakao Pay, the online payments unit of Kakao, which offers messaging... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
